sentences.en: Being neurotic about punctuality, they begin ( and end ) meetings exactly when scheduled.
sentences.cn: 他们十分讲究准时, 完全按时开会和散会.

sentences.en: He's becoming more and more obsessive about punctuality.
sentences.cn: 他对守时要求越来越过分了。

sentences.en: He's been taken to task for his habitual lack of punctuality.
sentences.cn: 他因为经常不准时而受到批评.

sentences.en: Huaying Engineering Translation Office solemnly promises: Good Faith, Confidentiality and Punctuality.
sentences.cn: 华英工程翻译事务所向客户郑重承诺: 诚信, 保密,守时.

sentences.en: I pride myself on my punctuality, accuracy, and dependability.
sentences.cn: 我准时守信, 精益求精,值得信任.

sentences.en: I'll have to have a word with them about punctuality.
sentences.cn: 我势必要得到他们关于守时的一句话.

sentences.en: Question 1 : can you say something about the importance of punctuality?
sentences.cn: 问题 1: 你讲讲守时的重要性 吗 ?

sentences.en: She lays great stress on punctuality , ie regards it as very important.
sentences.cn: 她非常强调要遵守时刻.

sentences.en: Stubbs is the soul of punctuality, and efficiency.
sentences.cn: 斯塔布思是个最准时, 最干练的人.

sentences.en: The aim of the company is punctuality, professional and devotion.
sentences.cn: 公司拥有一批业务素质高,责任心强,经验丰富, 敬业爱岗的员工.

sentences.en: The airline hopes to improve punctuality next year.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司希望明年在准点上做出改善。

sentences.en: The most lovable and hateful thing in him is his punctuality.
sentences.cn: 他这个人最可爱和最可恨的一点都是他的守时.

sentences.en: The nightmares appeared to him with celestial punctuality every single night he spent in the squadron.
sentences.cn: 他睡在中队里的每个晚上,恶梦总象日月星辰运转那样准时地找上他来.

sentences.en: This company puts a premium on punctuality - so don't he late.
sentences.cn: 这家公司非常强调进上下班准时 —— 所以你一定不要迟到.

trans.tran_en: Punctuality is the quality of being punctual
